# antaresEditObject ![](reference/figures/antares_simulator.png)

  

> Edit an Antares study before running a simulation.

## Installation

Install from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("antaresEditObject")
```

Or install dev version from GitHub:

``` r
remotes::install_github("rte-antares-rpackage/antaresEditObject", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Goal

This package allows to edit an Antares study. Methods are provided to
create (and remove) areas, links between them, thermal clusters and
binding constraints. These steps may be useful before running an Antares
simulation.

See website for more documentation:
<https://rte-antares-rpackage.github.io/antaresEditObject/>

## Usage

Usage of the package is detailed in the vignette:
[`vignette("antaresEditObject")`](articles/antaresEditObject.md).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`activateRES()`](activateRES.md) : Activate RES in an Antares study

- [`activateST()`](activateST.md) : Activate st-storage in an Antares
  study

- [`add_week_number_column_to_ts()`](add_week_number_column_to_ts.md) :
  Add week number column to a data.time of time series type

- [`adequacyOptions()`](adequacyOptions.md) : Adequacy patch parameters
  for creating an area

- [`api_patch()`](api_patch.md) : API methods

- [`backupStudy()`](backupStudy.md) : Create a backup with an Antares
  Study

- [`is_antares_v7()`](check-version.md)
  [`is_antares_v820()`](check-version.md) : Is study an Antares v7 study
  ?

- [`checkRemovedArea()`](checkRemovedArea.md) : Seek for a removed area

- [`check_consistency_reservoir_values()`](check_consistency_reservoir_values.md)
  : For a given area, check consistency between reservoir and reservoir
  capacity values

- [`check_mingen_vs_hydro_storage()`](check_mingen_vs_hydro_storage.md)
  : Check if mingen data and hydro storage data are consistent

- [`check_mingen_vs_maxpower()`](check_mingen_vs_maxpower.md) : Check if
  mingen data and maxpower data are consistent

- [`cleanUpOutput()`](cleanUpOutput.md) : Clean up output based on
  geographic trimming

- [`computeOtherFromHourlyMulti()`](computeOtherFromHourlyMulti.md) :
  Compute daily, weekly, monthly and annual mc-ind from hourly data
  multiyear. (new)

- [`computeOtherFromHourlyYear()`](computeOtherFromHourlyYear.md) :
  Compute daily, weekly, monthly and annual mc-ind from hourly data for
  one year. (new)

- [`computeTimeStampFromHourly()`](computeTimeStampFromHourly.md) :
  Compute daily, weekly, monthly and annual mc-ind from hourly data.

- [`convertConfigToAdq()`](convertConfigToAdq.md) : Read adequacy patch
  config.yml into Antares (v8.5+)

- [`copyOutput()`](copyOutput.md) : Copy of the output files of an
  Antares study

- [`copyStudyWeb()`](copyStudyWeb.md) : Import physical study to Antares
  Web (managed study)

- [`createStudy()`](create-study.md)
  [`createStudyAPI()`](create-study.md) : Create an empty Antares study

- [`createArea()`](createArea.md) : Create an area in an Antares study

- [`createBindingConstraint()`](createBindingConstraint.md) : Create a
  binding constraint

- [`createBindingConstraintBulk()`](createBindingConstraintBulk.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Create multiple binding constraint at once.

- [`createCluster()`](createCluster.md)
  [`createClusterRES()`](createCluster.md) : Create a cluster

- [`createClusterBulk()`](createClusterBulk.md) : Create serial thermal
  cluster

- [`createClusterST()`](createClusterST.md) : Create a short-term
  storage cluster

- [`createDSR()`](createDSR.md) [`getCapacityDSR()`](createDSR.md)
  [`editDSR()`](createDSR.md) : Create a Demand Side Response (DSR)

- [`createDistrict()`](createDistrict.md) : Create a district

- [`createLink()`](createLink.md) : Create a link between two areas

- [`createPSP()`](createPSP.md) [`getCapacityPSP()`](createPSP.md)
  [`editPSP()`](createPSP.md) : Create a Pumped Storage Power plant
  (PSP)

- [`create_scb_referential_series_type()`](create_scb_referential_series_type.md)
  : Create the correspondence data frame between the symbol and the type
  in scenario builder

- [`deleteStudy()`](deleteStudy.md) : Delete a study or a simulation

- [`detect_pattern_in_binding_constraint()`](detect_pattern_in_binding_constraint.md)
  : Detect a pattern in a binding constraint coefficient

- [`dicoAdequacySettings()`](dicoAdequacySettings.md) :

  Correspondence between arguments of `updateAdequacySettings` and
  actual Antares parameters.

- [`dicoGeneralSettings()`](dicoGeneralSettings.md) :

  Correspondence between arguments of `updateGeneralSettings` and actual
  Antares parameters.

- [`dicoOptimizationSettings()`](dicoOptimizationSettings.md) :

  Correspondence between arguments of `updateOptimizationSettings` and
  actual Antares parameters.

- [`dicoOutputSettings()`](dicoOutputSettings.md) :

  Correspondence between arguments of `updateOutputSettings` and actual
  Antares parameters.

- [`.api_command_execute_edit_area()`](dot-api_command_execute_edit_area.md)
  : Edit area's parameters in API mode.

- [`.api_command_execute_edit_area_ui()`](dot-api_command_execute_edit_area_ui.md)
  : Edit area's ui in API mode.

- [`.format_ini_rhs()`](dot-format_ini_rhs.md) : Format a value to a
  suitable format to rhs in an .ini file.

- [`.format_playlist_weights()`](dot-format_playlist_weights.md) :
  Generate playlist_year_weight section in the appropriate format.

- [`.format_ui_data_by_mode()`](dot-format_ui_data_by_mode.md) :
  Generate the data for the ui part by study mode.

- [`.initializeLinksArea()`](dot-initializeLinksArea.md) : Initialize
  links data for a new area. For disk mode only.

- [`.initializeRenewablesArea()`](dot-initializeRenewablesArea.md) :
  Initialize renewables data for a new area. For disk mode only.

- [`.initializeThermalArea()`](dot-initializeThermalArea.md) :
  Initialize thermal data for a new area. For disk mode only.

- [`.split_nodalOptimization_by_target()`](dot-split_nodalOptimization_by_target.md)
  : Split list nodalOptimization by target file.

- [`editArea()`](editArea.md) : Edit an area in an Antares study

- [`editBindingConstraint()`](editBindingConstraint.md) : Update an
  existing binding constraint

- [`editCluster()`](editCluster.md) [`editClusterRES()`](editCluster.md)
  : Edit an existing cluster

- [`editClusterST()`](editClusterST.md) : Edit a short-term storage
  cluster

- [`editLink()`](editLink.md) : Edit a link between two areas

- [`fill_empty_hydro_ini_file()`](fill_empty_hydro_ini_file.md) : Write
  default values in hydro.ini file if the section is empty

- [`fill_empty_hydro_ts_file()`](fill_empty_hydro_ts_file.md) :

  Write default input time series if `mingen.txt` or/and `mod.txt` is
  empty

- [`filteringOptions()`](filteringOptions.md) : Output profile options
  for creating an area

- [`getJobLogs()`](getJobLogs.md) : Retrieve job log from API

- [`getJobs()`](getJobs.md) : Retrieve API jobs

- [`get_default_hydro_ini_values()`](get_default_hydro_ini_values.md) :
  Get default hydro.ini values

- [`get_type_check_mingen_vs_hydrostorage()`](get_type_check_mingen_vs_hydrostorage.md)
  : Get the type of control to execute using the 3 necessary booleans

- [`get_type_check_mingen_vs_hydrostorage_to_trigger()`](get_type_check_mingen_vs_hydrostorage_to_trigger.md)
  : Get the type of control to execute between mingen data and hydro
  storage data

- [`get_type_check_mingen_vs_maxpower_to_trigger()`](get_type_check_mingen_vs_maxpower_to_trigger.md)
  : Get the type of control to execute between mingen data and maxpower
  data

- [`importZipStudyWeb()`](importZipStudyWeb.md) : Import a local study
  to Antares Web

- [`list_pollutants_values()`](list_pollutants_values.md) : Output
  pollutants list for thermal clusters

- [`mockSimulationAPI()`](mockSimulationAPI.md) : Mock API usage

- [`nodalOptimizationOptions()`](nodalOptimizationOptions.md) : Nodal
  optimization parameters for creating an area

- [`getPlaylist()`](playlist.md) [`setPlaylist()`](playlist.md) : Get
  the playlist of an Antares study

- [`propertiesLinkOptions()`](propertiesLinkOptions.md) : Properties for
  creating a link

- [`removeArea()`](removeArea.md) : Remove an area from an Antares study

- [`removeBindingConstraint()`](removeBindingConstraint.md) : Remove a
  Binding Constraint

- [`removeCluster()`](removeCluster.md)
  [`removeClusterRES()`](removeCluster.md)
  [`removeClusterST()`](removeCluster.md) : Remove a cluster

- [`removeDistrict()`](removeDistrict.md) : Remove a district

- [`removeLink()`](removeLink.md) : Remove a link between two areas

- [`replicate_missing_ts()`](replicate_missing_ts.md) : Replicate a
  data.table as many times as needed to get the same number of time
  series between 2 data.tables

- [`rollback_to_previous_data()`](rollback_to_previous_data.md) :
  Rollback to previous hydro data if the data is not consistent

- [`runSimulation()`](runSimulation.md) : Run an Antares Simulation

- [`runTsGenerator()`](runTsGenerator.md) : Run Time-Series Generator

- [`scenarioBuilder()`](scenario-builder.md)
  [`readScenarioBuilder()`](scenario-builder.md)
  [`updateScenarioBuilder()`](scenario-builder.md)
  [`clearScenarioBuilder()`](scenario-builder.md)
  [`deduplicateScenarioBuilder()`](scenario-builder.md) : Read, create,
  update & deduplicate scenario builder

- [`searchStudy()`](searchStudy.md) : Search study in AntaREST

- [`setAPImode()`](setAPImode.md) : Set API mode

- [`setSolverPath()`](setSolverPath.md) : Set path to Antares Solver

- [`setThematicTrimming()`](setThematicTrimming.md) : Set the thematic
  trimming of an Antares Study

- [`storage_values_default()`](storage_values_default.md) : Short Term
  Storage Property List

- [`updateAdequacySettings()`](updateAdequacySettings.md) : Update
  adequacy parameters of an Antares study

- [`updateGeneralSettings()`](updateGeneralSettings.md) : Update general
  parameters of an Antares study

- [`updateInputSettings()`](updateInputSettings.md) : Update input
  parameters of an Antares study

- [`updateOptimizationSettings()`](updateOptimizationSettings.md) :
  Update optimization parameters of an Antares study

- [`updateOutputSettings()`](updateOutputSettings.md) : Update output
  parameters of an Antares study

- [`update_generaldata_by_section()`](update_generaldata_by_section.md)
  : Update a specific section in generaldata.ini file

- [`getVariantCommands()`](variant-commands.md)
  [`writeVariantCommands()`](variant-commands.md) : Get API commands
  generated

- [`createVariant()`](variant.md) [`useVariant()`](variant.md) : Create
  a study's variant

- [`writeIni()`](write-ini.md) [`writeIniFile()`](write-ini.md)
  [`writeIniAPI()`](write-ini.md) : Write configuration options in file
  or API

- [`writeEconomicOptions()`](writeEconomicOptions.md) : Write Economic
  Options

- [`writeHydroValues()`](writeHydroValues.md) : Write Hydro Values

- [`writeIniHydro()`](writeIniHydro.md) : Edit hydro.ini values

- [`writeInputTS()`](writeInputTS.md) : Write input time series

- [`writeMiscGen()`](writeMiscGen.md) : Write Misc Gen data

- [`writeOutputValues()`](writeOutputValues.md) : Write output value for
  Antares

- [`writeSeriesPrepro()`](writeSeriesPrepro.md) : Write prepro data

- [`writeWaterValues()`](writeWaterValues.md) : Write water values
